properties.description: Populates SF_FLIGHT_PROD SQL table with data from blob storage.

transformations.name: AddWrkflwIDandTS
transformations.description: Add columns for ADF workflow ID and timestamp.

transformations.name: ActualAirportIDifNULL
transformations.description: If actual depart/arrive airport ID is null, populates with sched depart/arrive airport ID.

transformations.name: PareAirportReference
transformations.description: Removes unnecessary columns from airport reference data.

transformations.name: SchdDepAirportLookup
transformations.description: Looks up IATA, ICAO and FAA airport codes for scheduled departure airport.

transformations.name: UpdateSchdDepAirportCode
transformations.description: Populates sched departure airport code with IATA, ICAO or FAA code (whichever is available first).

transformations.name: RemoveSchdDepAirportCols
transformations.description: Removes unneeded lookup columns inserted from airport reference table.

transformations.name: SchdArrAirportLookup
transformations.description: Looks up IATA, ICAO and FAA airport codes for scheduled arrival airport.

transformations.name: UpdateSchdArrAirportCode
transformations.description: Populates sched arrival airport code with IATA, ICAO or FAA code (whichever is available first).

transformations.name: RemoveSchArrAirportCols
transformations.description: Removes unneeded lookup columns inserted from airport reference table.

transformations.name: ActDepAirportLookup
transformations.description: Looks up IATA, ICAO and FAA airport codes for actual departure airport.

transformations.name: UpdateActDepAirportCode
transformations.description: Populates actual departure airport code with IATA, ICAO or FAA code (whichever is available first).

transformations.name: RemoveActDepAirportCols
transformations.description: Removes unneeded lookup columns inserted from airport reference table.

transformations.name: ActArrAirportLookup
transformations.description: Looks up IATA, ICAO and FAA airport codes for actual arrival airport.

transformations.name: UpdateActArrAirportCode
transformations.description: Populates actual arrival airport code with IATA, ICAO or FAA code (whichever is available first).

transformations.name: RemoveActArrAirportCols
transformations.description: Removes unneeded lookup columns inserted from airport reference table.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		flight_id as integer,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		ops_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		base_airport_id as string,
		sched_depart_airport_id as string,
		sched_arrive_airport_id as string,
		actual_depart_airport_id as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,
		base_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as integer,
		cargo_on as integer,
		cargo_off as integer,
		fuel_out as double,
		fuel_in as double,
		fuel_uplift as integer,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> SFFlight
source(output(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		elevation_feet as string,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> AirportReferenceJSON
SFFlight derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS filter(flight_type <=> 'flight' || flight_type <=> 'continuation' || flight_type <=> 'divert' || flight_type <=> 'return' || flight_type <=> 'taxi-back') ~> FLTTYPEfilter
FLTTYPEfilter derive(actual_arrive_airport_id = iif(isNull(actual_arrive_airport_id), sched_arrive_airport_id, actual_arrive_airport_id),
		actual_depart_airport_id = iif(isNull(actual_depart_airport_id) , sched_depart_airport_id, actual_depart_airport_id)) ~> ActualAirportIDifNULL
AirportReferenceJSON select(mapColumn(
		airport_id,
		iata_code,
		icao_code,
		faa_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PareAirportReference
ActualAirportIDifNULL, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_depart_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdDepAirportLookup
SchdDepAirportLookup derive(scheduled_departure_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdDepAirportCode
UpdateSchdDepAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		estimated_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchdDepAirportCols
RemoveSchdDepAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_arrive_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdArrAirportLookup
SchdArrAirportLookup derive(scheduled_arrival_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdArrAirportCode
UpdateSchdArrAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		estimated_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchArrAirportCols
RemoveSchArrAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(actual_depart_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ActDepAirportLookup
ActDepAirportLookup derive(actual_departure_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateActDepAirportCode
UpdateActDepAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		estimated_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveActDepAirportCols
RemoveActDepAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(actual_arrive_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ActArrAirportLookup
ActArrAirportLookup derive(actual_arrival_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateActArrAirportCode
UpdateActArrAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveActArrAirportCols
RemoveActArrAirportCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,
		actual_depart_airport_id as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_oooi_in as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_off as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_on as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_out as timestamp,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		base_airport as string,
		base_airport_id as string,
		cargo_off as integer,
		cargo_on as integer,
		cargo_weight as integer,
		estimated_arrival as timestamp,
		estimated_departure as timestamp,
		flight_date as date,
		flight_id as integer,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_type as string,
		fuel_in as double,
		fuel_out as double,
		fuel_uplift as integer,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		is_canceled as string,
		is_verified as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		notes as string,
		ops_type as string,
		sched_arrive_airport_id as string,
		sched_depart_airport_id as string,
		scheduled_arrival as timestamp,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure as timestamp,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FlightToSQL
